CheckTitle: Check if virtual networks (VNets) use public IP addresses
Description: Detect virtual networks (VNets) that are using public IP addresses, which may increase the risk of external exposure.
Risk: Using public IP addresses directly in virtual networks may lead to unintended external exposure, increasing the risk of attack.

Recommendation.Text: Restrict the use of public IP addresses to necessary networks only and ensure additional security measures such as firewalls are in place.

Notes: VNets using public IP addresses should have controlled and monitored security measures.
